ygData.subject: RE: Elemental and Purifying weaving
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe - ya one word: ZONE!!!!! hehe - seriously - it is a wild and crazy place! Sylly. ... From:	Joseph Mounts [mailto:jmounts@trc.nn.k12.va.us] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe - ya one word:

ZONE!!!!!

hehe - seriously - it is a wild and crazy place!

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Joseph Mounts [mailto:jmounts@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 9:46 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Elemental and Purifying
weaving

From: Joseph Mounts <jmounts@...>

As i hit send for my last message, i thought that I should
have asked for
some tips for the Unrest for a young bard. Any of you
Bardic Gods have
advice for a young bard battling in the Estate of Unrest?

Thanks in advance,
Elwe, 16th Song
Karana
